flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: In the early days of my LVL1 membership, I was wondering which of my project skills to use as a show piece. After much thought, I decided on a nuclear fussion reactor. But the reactor would take time, so I decided to build a diorama. The diorama would show my electronic skills, my item reutilization skills as well as a sense of humor. Realizing that Dr. Frankenstein is a role model to some hackers, I decided to model his hakerspace with a touch of LVL1.
guide.introduction_rendered:
In the early days of my LVL1 membership, I was wondering which of my project skills to use as a show piece. After much thought, I decided on a nuclear fussion reactor. But the reactor would take time, so I decided to build a diorama. The diorama would show my electronic skills, my item reutilization skills as well as a sense of humor. Realizing that Dr. Frankenstein is a role model to some hackers, I decided to model his hakerspace with a touch of LVL1.

Relevant parts
  • disposable camera flash unit
guide.summary: Creating a diorama from existing items with no modifications, items with slight modification and complete rip, strip and rewire modifications.
guide.title: LVL1 Castle Diorama
